channel.title: Blogs on Tiffany Guard
channel.description: Recent content in Blogs on Tiffany Guard

item.title: My Travels
item.description: I recently traveled to the North East! I visited Connecticut, Rhode Island, Massachusetts, Vermont, New Hampshire, and New York within a short six day period. Please enjoy some of the pictures I was able to capture!

item.title: Python
item.description: When it comes to Python, in comparison to R, to view the data, you must insert “.describe” instead of inserting “view” or “summary.” I also learned to insert “plt.scatter” to view a scatterplot of your data. Being able to visualize your numbers can tremendously aid scientists and data analysts in whatever source of information they are piecing together. library(reticulate) import pandas as pd faithful=pd.read_csv("https://vincentarelbundock.github.io/Rdatasets/csv/datasets/faithful.csv") faithful["eruptions"].describe() ## count 272.000000 ## mean 3.
